sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Large Event Facilities Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Large Event Facilities Act.

sections.heading: Definition of event facility. In this Act, "event facility" means a permanent structure for holding public meetings or public events, including, but not limited to, baseball games, football games, hockey games, automobile races, or other musical, dramatic, artistic, social, or athletic events
